name: Shoes Gallery
technoligy: React, Node, Express, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, React Hook Form, Bootstrap, Firebase, Tailwind CSS
desc: Its a a Fully Responsive, User Friendly, Professional Designed, Secuired E-Commerce Website. Firebase authentication is implemented here. A user can buy his favorite shoe from here. The dashboard is different for the admin and general users. General users can see their ordered products and they can add a review.  When an admin will logged in he/she will see all orders. He/She will be able to delete an order or change the order status. He/She will be able to add a product, make an admin, and manage all products
